"HEY, DOWN HERE!!" She yelled.

'Damn,' she thought, boots can't talk then.

She suddenly saw the huge bosom and realised Tifa was the one who came in. She continued to yell to try and get Tifa's attention!!

"Yuffie," Tifa yelled, "Damn, she must have forgotton that she was meeting me!" "Hmmm, what are these??"

Yuffie saw Tifa bend down and inspect her, "these are nice," she said.

Yuffies hope faded as she realised that Tifa thought she was just another pair of boots.

"I wonder if they fit??"

Yuffie felt a wave of pleasure as Tifa first slid her left foot in and then her right. The smell of Tifa's feet was overwhelming and she really wanted to touch herself and finish this tormenting orgasm she was on the brink of.

"They fit fine" Tifa said, "Now to find Yuffie"

Where does Tifa go first.....
113211.title: No idea!!

choices: Tifa and Aerith find the Materia and test it on Yuffie
Aerith has a nice day selling flowers
113212.content:
(OC: >.< waaaay too many choice chapters XD Still has potential :) )

Yuffie sat still, unable to move her, now leather, body. She occasionally saw a few of her friends wander past, but without a mouth or any form of communication she found it hopeless. The little thief gazed around her messy room in despair at her situation as the hours started to tick by. Yuffie felt her eyes slowly close as boredom forced her to sleep.

"Hm?" A voice echoed above the sleeping boots. Yuffie slowly woke up to see a pair of tight black shorts getting stretched by two perfect legs. Two red, gloved fists with fine crafted cuts rested on the awaiting curvy hips of the impatient girl as she lent to the side. "Yuffie!" The voice boomed as the hand darted towards the poor boots
"A--Ahh! Wait a second~!" Yuffie yelled before the yelling girls manicured hand grasped Yuffie's new body, dragging her skywards towards the glittering hazzle eyes of Tifa as she blew away a stray hair.
"How many times..." Tifa muttered, whisping the faint smell of alcohol from her breath as she swung the thief girl away from her face as she marched out of Yuffie's room.
"Hey! T.. Tifa... stop swinging m... ~" Yuffie cried out.
"Hey Aerith! Found your boots.... Yuffie nicked em as a joke ~" Tifa called out, uncaringly dumping Yuffie down as she walked past a chair.

Yuffie hit the ground with a thud as she tipped over. Her view seemed to have changed to the insole in the impact.
"Why...?" Yuffie muttered, knowing the answer as she dizzily gazed out of the boots opening towards a open door as Tifa's thick boots wandered heavily past.
"They're by the chair" Tifa's voice boomed as a pair a gentle socked white feet stepped angelically out. To Yuffie's dismay, the socks had discoloured to grey.

Aerith stepped out from the kitchen with a basket in her hand,
"Why would Yuffie have my shoes?" She asked gently as Tifa sat down on the chair, scooting it backwards a bit.
"Probably a prank..." Tifa blankly replied as she scooted around in her chair, gazing up towards the flower girls stylish red jacket and crystal eyes with a shrug.
"I suppose" Aerith spoke as she wondered across the room, leaving fading dents in the carpet with each step before standing over the cute boots. Without a second thought she ajusted them to stand up straight.

Yuffie yelled out towards her friend as she adjusted weight to her right foot,
"Wait! What are you doing?!" The thief whimpered as Aerith balanced on one foot, slowly blocking out Yuffie's light with her other. Two thumbs grabbed the rim as the biggest toes Yuffie had ever seen slowly wiggled in before Aerith gave a quick tug, covering the small Yuffie's yells with the ball of her dusty socked foot before ramming in her heel with an unnoticing squelch. The flower girl widened her eyes slightly at the warmness of her shoe, yet ignored the pleasant feeling as she stomped it with grace onto her foot properly.

Aerith slipped the other boot on with ease as she smiled heavenly towards Tifa,
"Lets go... My flowers should be in full bloom so hopefully I'll sell alot!" Aerith smiled as she rose to full height. Tifa shrugged,
"Ah, I won't be that long... going to just pick up a few things from town."

Yuffie whimpered as the dirty sock rubbed over her face with increasing pressure. She felt like she was hugging her friends entire foot as the dirt and grime wiped off onto her.
"W..what now..?" Yuffie heard her muttered words as the foot lifted off before slamming back down like she wasn't standing on anyone.

Yuffie winced at the realisation that no one knew she was getting stepped on. To everyone she was just a boot, something to protect Aerith's unaware steps. She could be here forever as her friend walked arount, totally unaware of what she was doing to her friend...
"H..help.." Yuffie mustered as the foot slammed back down onto her, steamrolling off for the next step.
113212.title: Aerith's

12.content: Which girl will it be??
12.title: Who??

choices: They enjoy their meal at the table and a bird Interrupts it
Zidane puts a blanket down and makes it a breakfast picknick!
131.content: It's been two years since Zidane's return and she couldn't be happier. As a Queen she doesn't always has a lot of time for her beloved Prince Consort as she wishes to. Which makes days, like this one, with both of them spending every moment together, special. They were able to convince their great protectors Captain Adelbert Steiner and General Beatrix to have the day to themselves. With no important appointments for Zidane and herself to attend to, a few rules were established and the two love birds spend their day off simple. It started with a lovely breakfast in the flower garden of the castle. It took Garnet nothing to get it arranged. She loved spending her tea time in the quiet garden, it was soothing for her. Zidane having no problem making his queen happy agreed. For once eager to eat breakfast somewhere more private. Upon arriving at the rendezvous point...
131.title: Different views

choices: Zidane dares her to use a spell to change her race for a day
Garnet decides to become something else
1312.content:
Zidane looked at the laid table filled with food. It has Chicken cooked in almond, bacon and honey, Grilled porridge with jam, butter and spices, various fruits and vegetables. Even after two years he still kinda dislikes royal dishes. At least Quina knows how to make it eatable...mostly. He stopped Garnet from sitting down at the table. Garnet turned around surprised, looking him up and down, her eyes focused longer on his agitated tail. "Is something wrong, Zidane?" A smile started growing across his face. "Let's loosen up this breakfast a little, shall we?" . Zidane looked around, discovering a simple red blanket. His tail twitching fast as he went to inspect it. Garnet raising an eyebrow, kept an eye on her husband. This should do it!
 He went back to his slightly confused wife, with the blanket in hand. Scouting the garden he saw a cozy spot beside the fountain, placing the blanket on the ground. Step by step he carefully placed their breakfast onto it. Garnet finally realizing his plan, helps taking the last dishes plus a pair of pillows to the new location, collectively they sit down and admire their work. "Tada! A breakfast picnic! I'm sure you haven't had one of those before." The genome smiles, his tail brushing softly against Garnet, who is unable to contain her laughter. "A breakfast picnic? Certainly not! You're the only one I can think of who can come up with something like that". "I'm glad you like it, your majesty." He teased her while grabbing a fork to swoop up a piece of bacon and bringing it to his queens' mouth. "Let's dig in!" Chuckling she accepted his offer. They finished their meal, putting the remaining dishes aside to enjoy the company of each other cuddling. After a while the monkey boy breaks the comfortable silence. " You're right the garden is soothing.." Garnet who was nuzzled in his neck opened her eyes, staring into the distance. " And beautiful..". He watched her lost in thoughts. He follows his lovers gaze..leading to a bush of crimson roses. His tail picking up the speed brushing a little violently at Garnets' back, getting her attention off of the flowers and onto her husband, which started to get up. "Zidane?" Now it was her turn to look after him. His tail never slowing down the hole way to the rose bush. He stopped in front of the flowers. Searching it for the most eye catching blossom. His tail temporarily in peace as he is lost in thoughts. A very curious raven haired woman's head copying it's swaying motion. Finding a worthy rose as a gift for his wife, he plugs it and returns to her victoriously. He bends down, his eyes closed. "For my beloved Dagger, I have gathered a yet simple crimson rose, daring to challenge your divine beauty but miserably fails". Hearing no response he opens his eyes, seeing Garnet staring at him. "Uh...Dagger?" A little startled she blinks. "Huh..?". His smug smile widening. "I mean..we both know how handsome I am. I thought you might want this flower but apparently I am what you want." Her cheeks were burning by being caught staring though for the wrong reason. She was really bad at it from time to time. "Well..I...-" She trailed Off while reaching for the beautiful rose in his hands. "-got a little...Ouch!?" Garnet flinched as she pulled her hand away scaring Zidane. "Dagger! Are you okay?!" He dropped the rose, his tail swaying uncontrollably around. "I'm..okay just stung myself.." she hissed. "Damn it I should have cut the thorns off first!, Let me see.." the genome reached for her hand, carefully inspecting it. He could see a few blood droplets over her palm. "It's okay..really..I can just heal it" As on cue she channeled a white glow from her right hand and indulged the other with it, healing her wounds. "See? Everything is fine" she gives him a warm smile but his sorrowful expression never leaving his face. She signs, pulls him into a hug while patting his back. The blond haired boy returns the hug , nuzzling her this time, mumbling. "I'm sorry..." His tail whirling around her waist. Garnet couldn't stop a few giggles to rise from her. Zidane clearly confused now looks at her ."What's so funny?" . "I'm sorry..haha.. but your tail keeps distracting me today!" . Her words sinking in "My tail..?...How?" His voice reverting back to a more curious tone. "Whenever your getting excited it started to swing around more than usually...mostly brushing or tickling me!" . He broke out of her hug, taking a deep exaggerated breath. "My tail moving around!? No way! And it dared to tickle you! Bad tail!" He couldn't stop laughing. "Of course I do! You know what I meant, Zidane!" Catching his breath he answered "Sorry, sorry..haha but you should know by now my Queen, that it has an mind of it's own!". She stands up laughing as well. "Really funny, Zidane. And how do you expect me to know this? I can't remember having one!" He looks up at her "Why don't you try it then?". She looks at him dumbfounded "Excuse me?" ...
1312.title: Zidane creates a breakfast picnic

132.content: Kind of arbitrary but you've got to go with what you can work with.
132.title: Some more girls to choose from

choices: Some type of animal, like a moogle.
A phase-shift, to become something like a liquid or rubber girl.
Something completely inanimate, out of curiosity.
1321.content: What exactly is a girl with a talent for being a mage supposed to do to handle boredom? In Eiko's case, she's become curious about what things would be like as something else entirely, so she begins looking through various tomes regarding transformation spells. The only question on her mind is what kind of thing is she looking to become?
1321.title: When Eiko Gets Bored

13213.content: Something about becoming an object seemed to particularly spark an interest with Eiko. Still being young at heart despite all she's been though, the idea of making herself into a sentient toy of some sort seemed like a perfect idea to her. Her question now is, should she go all out and go for something that would completely change her shape, or just something like a plush toy?
13213.title: Toying Around

choices: Something else along the lines of a block.
132132.content:
For her, it wasn't enough to simply become something else. Eiko also wanted to know what it felt like to have her body be completely altered to the point where she took on a completely different shape entirely.

At last, Eiko felt she was ready to actually apply one of these various spells to herself. She decided to just pick the first she came across: a spell that would make her into a letter block.

Once she's ready, she shuts her eyes and recites the spell. Almost immediately she feels the change start to take place, starting with her torso and abdomen, which are expanding outward to form the shape of the block. The block part of her body continues to grow, taking up her arms and legs, while her head shifts towards the front. Eiko giggles just a little as she feels her hands, feet, and head start to get overtaken by her block body, until each look like they've been engraved into her body. An indentation for the letter 'E' forms on the top of her body while one for 'e' forms on her back. Then the material change starts to take place. Eiko grins so that her face gets locked into that shape as her surface becomes wooden, and then feels like everything inside of her is becoming solid wood from the bottom of her body to the top, as if she was being filled up with the material. Even the air inside of her body gets mostly taken up by wood, leaving her feeling quite a bit 'full' as the transformation finishes.

"Wow...I can't believe this worked as well as it did! I can't wait to try some more complex shapes..." Eiko thinks to herself.
132132.title: Blocky Eiko

info.brief_description: Please contribute!! GPs given to good additions!!!!
info.description:
Final Fantasy transformation story - WELCOME

Simple rules...

-No sudden endings, leave the story open ended.
-No short chapters if possible (except at the beginning when selecting character!!)
-NO vore, furries, toilet stuff, age progression, weight gaining.

Age regression and any other Transformations (Shrinking, inanimate/animal) are perfectly fine.

ONLY FEMALES ARE TRANSFORMED!! You can have multiple transformations along one thread.

Please add and enjoy!!
